text: Pang Tu-sop is a North Korean army generalKim Jong Un Issues Order to Promote Military Ranks of KPA and politician. ==Biography== He was known to be appointed as commander of the Second Corps of the Korean People's Army in 2015.N. Korean front-line commander replaced after inter-Korean conflict In May 2016, following the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea he was elected a full member of the 7th Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.Party leadership members elected ==References== Category:Workers' Party of Korea politicians Category:North Korean generals
title: Pang Tu-sop
